explains: n. 粗略估计，近似值；类似事物，相似物；近似法
wordGroup: approximation method 近似方法；近似法；尝试法
linear approximation 线性近似，线性逼近
successive approximation 连续的近似值；连续的学习步骤；逐次近似计算法
born approximation 玻恩近似；玻饵似
least square approximation 最小平方逼近
degree of approximation 近似度，逼近度
initial approximation 初始近似值；起始方位；初始近似

sentences.en: As we know, 365.25 is only an approximation.
sentences.cn: 如我们所知，365.25只是一个近似值。

sentences.en: That is a fair approximation of the way in which the next boss is being chosen.
sentences.cn: 那是一个挑选下任老板的大体近似方式。

sentences.en: Clearly that's an approximation, but my guess is there'll be a reasonable balance.
sentences.cn: 显然那是一个近似值，但是我的猜测是会有不少余额。
